channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:24 Alarm lifted in Kirovohrad region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:24 Alarm lifted in Kirovohrad region. Follow further messages. #Kirovohrad_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 18:24 Repel the threat of shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 18:24 Repel the threat of shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community. item.title: 游리 18:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
